2025-12-06.content: [Registration sharing]Manage production alerting in a separate instance or project from model training and evaluation without paying twice for registered parties. See [Party registration sharing for multiple instances](https://docs.cloud.google.com/financial-services/anti-money-laundering/docs/register-parties) to find out more about how this works.

summary.title: Improve production alerting and model training
summary.summary: Manage production alerting in a separate instance or project from model training and evaluation. This new feature allows you to avoid paying twice for registered parties, providing more flexibility and cost efficiency. Learn more about party registration sharing for multiple instances.

2025-12-06.content: [Model copying]Copy an AML AI model to a separate AML AI instance. See [Copy models to new instances](https://docs.cloud.google.com/financial-services/anti-money-laundering/docs/copy-model-instances) to find out more about how this works.

summary.title: Copy AML AI Models
summary.summary: You can now copy an AML AI model to a separate AML AI instance. This feature allows for greater flexibility in managing and deploying your AI models. Refer to the documentation for detailed instructions on how to perform this operation.

2025-09-03.content: New minor engine versions released for retail line of business within the v004 tuning version. This extends support for the major version and includes no significant changes compared to the previous minor version.

summary.title: New minor engine versions released
summary.summary: New minor engine versions have been released for the retail line of business under the v004 tuning version. This update extends support for the major version and introduces no significant changes from the previous minor version.

2025-09-03.content: New minor engine version released for commercial line of business within the v004 tuning version. This extends support for the major version and includes no significant changes versus the previous minor version.

summary.title: New Engine Version Released
summary.summary: A new minor engine version has been released for the commercial line of business. This update extends support for the major version and introduces no significant changes from the previous minor version.

2025-07-10.content: A new major engine version is now available for Retail and Commercial lines of business, within the v4 tuning version. This includes a more reliable training performance when using optional enum input fields.

summary.title: New Engine Version Available
summary.summary: A new major engine version (v4 tuning) is available for Retail and Commercial lines of business. This update improves training performance reliability, especially when using optional enum input fields.

2025-07-10.content: New minor [engine version](https://cloud.google.com/financial-services/anti-money-laundering/docs/private/engine-versions/aml-commercial.default.v004#aml-commercial.default.v004.008.202505-000) released for commercial line of business within the v004 tuning version. This extends support for the major version and includes no significant changes over the previous minor version.

summary.title: New Engine Version Released
summary.summary: New minor engine version released for commercial line of business.

2025-06-26.content: New minor engine version released for retail line of business within the v004 tuning version. This extends support for the major version and includes no significant changes versus the previous minor version.

summary.title: New Engine Version Released
summary.summary: A new minor engine version has been released for the v004 tuning version of the retail line of business. This update extends support for the major version and includes no significant changes from the previous minor version.

2025-05-28.content: A new minor engine version is available for Retail and Commercial lines of business, within the v3 tuning version and first v4 major version. These engine versions fix a known issue where prediction results may occasionally contain duplicate entries.

summary.title: New Engine Version Released
summary.summary: A new engine version is available for Retail and Commercial lines of business, fixing an issue with duplicate prediction results.
